actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to authorize that handicapped or disabled individuals under age 60 yet living at senior citizen centers may participate in congregate nutrition services offered at the center.

summary.text: Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965 to extend congregate nutrition services to handicapped or disabled individuals who are under age 60 and living at senior citizen centers where such services are provided.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to authorize that handicapped or disabled individuals under age 60 yet living at senior citizen centers may participate in congregate nutrition services offered at the center.
